info.name: EZY Skills API
info.description: Laravel REST API for EZY Skills. Set collection variables (baseUrl, token, teacherToken, courseId) before running requests. See docs/API.md for a step-by-step guide.

item.name: Register
item.description: Create a student account. Body params: name, email, phone_number (optional), password, password_confirmation.

item.name: Login
item.description: Login and receive a Sanctum token. Body params: email, password, device_name (optional). Copy token into collection variable {{token}}.

item.name: Me
item.description: Get the currently authenticated user. Requires Authorization: Bearer {{token}}.

item.name: Logout
item.description: Logout by revoking the current token. Requires Authorization: Bearer {{token}}.

item.name: List courses
item.description: List courses (paginated). Optional query params: search, tag (slug or name).

item.name: Course details
item.description: Public course details (video links are always locked here). Set {{courseId}} first.

item.name: Course content (locked/unlocked)
item.description: Course content endpoint. Video links are unlocked only for the course teacher or approved students. Requires Authorization: Bearer {{token}}.

item.name: Request enrollment (student)
item.description: Student requests enrollment for a course (no body). Requires Authorization: Bearer {{token}}. Response includes enrollment.id (use it as {{enrollmentId}}).

item.name: My enrollments (student)
item.description: List the authenticated student's enrollments. Requires Authorization: Bearer {{token}}.

item.name: Teacher enrollments
item.description: List enrollments for courses owned by the authenticated teacher. Requires Authorization: Bearer {{teacherToken}}. Use the returned enrollments[].id as {{enrollmentId}}.

item.name: Approve enrollment (teacher)
item.description: Approve an enrollment request. Requires Authorization: Bearer {{teacherToken}}. Set {{enrollmentId}} first.

item.name: Decline enrollment (teacher)
item.description: Decline an enrollment request. Requires Authorization: Bearer {{teacherToken}}. Set {{enrollmentId}} first.

item.name: Student courses
item.description: List approved courses for the authenticated student. Requires Authorization: Bearer {{token}}.

item.name: Teacher dashboard
item.description: Teacher dashboard: courses + pending enrollment request counts. Requires Authorization: Bearer {{teacherToken}}.

item.name: My notifications
item.description: List latest notifications for the authenticated user (up to 50). Requires Authorization. Teacher token is typically used here.

item.name: Mark notification as read
item.description: Mark a notification as read. Requires Authorization. Set {{notificationId}} from the My notifications response.

variable.description: Student Sanctum token. Get it from /api/auth/login or from `php artisan ezy:dev-tokens --reset`.
Teacher Sanctum token. Get it from `php artisan ezy:dev-tokens --reset`.
Course id to use in requests. Use seeded course id or output from `php artisan ezy:dev-tokens --reset`.
Enrollment id. Get it from the enrollment request response or from teacher enrollments.
Notification id. Get it from the notifications list response.
